page.title: 11CHILDREN'S GAMES IN JARROW
page.content: Children play games in the{schoolyard} and at{home.}They play different games at different ages.At{5}they play skips,fairy tales,mammys and daddys, hospitals and dolls.Aged{6}they play tig,hop_scotch,pass the ball,races and skip to my Lou.At{7}we like leap ball, races and skip to my Lou.At{8}we like leap frog,hand stands and American Rounders,and on the school patio treasure hunt.At{9}we play red,amber and green,rounders and hide and seek. At{10}leap frog,rounders and roller skates are still popular,but we become interested in football and netball.By{ {11}years,BMX bikes,netball,rounders, cricket and football are firm favourites,but we belong to running clubs,Judo and other organized sports. Bede Burn school has a football, netball,swimming and athletics teams to be members of.
